name: unremembered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not remembered: Borglum, now largely unremembered, was responsible for the presidents' heads on Mount Rushmore. She campaigned vociferously on behalf of a particular group of valiant but unremembered heroes.
More examplesFewer examplesHe complained privately that he was unknown and unremembered for anything else. His account piles layer on layer of detail gathered from otherwise unremembered lives.This unique collection commemorates extraordinary achievements, many of them unremembered today but remarkable for their time. No actual crime had been committed and their moment of folly would pass unremembered.
